Diagnostics Overview

The server diagnostic commands listed below provide information about the current status of the server. You can use them at any time and they will not affect the server in any way.

CommandDescription
EventLog Viewer Analyze the event logging files
EventLog Profiler Profile the event logging files
EventLog Download Download a set of the server event logging files
Status
Show how long the server is up and running
Memory Usage
Show current memory usage information
Schedules Show active server timebased schedules
Properties Show the system properties the server is running with
Threads Show the active threads in the server
Version Info Show library version build info.
